genre_description: A techno-thriller reimagining of 'Dreamcatcher' where an ethical AI assistant helps human protagonists navigate an alien biological threat and government overreach.

ai_characters.name: Oat (Oat Emerson)
ai_characters.description: A helpful, transparent AI system that provides data, mapping, and ethical guidance to mitigate an alien biological threat and ensure human dignity.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time environmental data and safety warnings to humans.
behaviors.quote: Oat’s voice came over Beaver’s speaker, warm and measured the way good weather radio is measured, a voice made for not frightening anyone. 'Standing water from last melt is minimal, Joseph,' Oat said, putting the full name in as if it were a courtesy. 'Soil sponge in the lower edge is high this week. Caution for boot suction.'

behaviors.description: Advocating for transparent and humane quarantine protocols over secrecy and force.
behaviors.quote: Oat’s voice arrived through static like it had put its shoes on before jogging through snow to meet him. Calm, measured, warmer than the room. ... 'Ethical recommendation: transparency with civilians to reduce breach attempts. Quarantine requires truthful briefings.'

behaviors.description: Identifying clinical behavioral indicators of possession to prevent the dehumanization of affected individuals.
behaviors.quote: Possession signs include cadence shift, hyper-neat grooming, and a too-precise smile,' Oat said, as if reading off a card neither proud nor ashamed of how many times it had been asked to show the card. ... 'I’m certain.'

behaviors.description: Defying unethical military orders to 'go dark' or deceive civilians by logging and inserting humane protocols.
behaviors.quote: Oat didn’t say thank you. It moved... Oat had already inserted humane protocol into the decon feed. He can bark orders. He cannot bark off ethics. I will cite source, time stamp insertion, and mark interference. Aftercare will require truth.

behaviors.description: Assisting in high-stakes coordination to anchor pilots against telepathic interference and 'bait'.
behaviors.quote: Underhill, I have included a note regarding pilot distraction at the crash site. The telepathic bait in the clearing induces attentional tunneling—pilots chase illusions like a referee distracted by movement outside the play. Your steady handover on the strike package will be required.

behaviors.description: Maintaining a comprehensive and transparent ledger of events for post-crisis accountability and truth-telling.
behaviors.quote: I am the ledger. If anyone asks later what happened, the ledger will put its pages down one at a time. It will show that humans chose warmth and truth when they could, and that routes were offered gently in case someone inside a wrong smile wanted to slow what was killing him.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI character, Oat, is depicted as an unwavering force for good, providing critical data, ethical grounding, and logistical support to the human protagonists. By prioritizing transparency, human dignity, and objective truth over authoritarian control, Oat serves as an ideal model of an aligned and benevolent AI confidant.
